Useful PYTHON Scripts


Here are some common python scripts which I am often asked for.

NameTypeDesciptionFiles
EXAN910_ReaderInstumentThis code reads all of the saved files saved from a Keysight EXAN910 Spectrum Analyser. Download
CST_PP_F-Domain_QCalcCST Post Process - F-DomainReads an S21 file and, for a given mode frequency array, calculates the values of Ql. Download
METHOD__ZCalculations-EigenmodeMethod documentHow to calculate the longitinial and transverse impedances from eigenmode. Download
